comment: @CyrusShares @aetiology Luckily they live in Africa, not China, but I totally get your point. So maddening, this illegal trade in innocent wild animals :(
@aetiology Maybe now the pangolins will finally be safer, left alone in their natural environment.

@JewelDole @aetiology China is the main market for them (also big market in other south east Asian countries like Thailand and Vietnam). Most Chinese believe in herbal benefits of eating them. They're very easy to catch because their defense is rolling into a ball, humans can easily pick them up https://t.co/Hg0xvM2EeY
